name: Heaven's Little Helper
description:
Control a cloud to catch peoples' souls before they fall into Hell. Drop their souls off at the gate to Heaven before the thieving imps can steal them from you. Catch a golden soul to destroy all the imps on the screen. Deliver as many souls to the golden gate as you can in 2 minutes. 

Controls: d-pad/wasd to move, catch falling souls (max capacity of 3!) and drop them off at the golden gate. 

Point system: gain 5 points upon successful delivery to Heaven, lose 5 points when a soul reaches the bottom of the screen.
